reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have returned to this hotel after its refurbishment some time ago. It is even more beautiful than before. No change as regards the friendliness of the staff, the sumptuous breakfast, the underground garage at no extra cost, the quality of the food at the Aphrodite and the sheer pleasure of having a drink in the evening in the comfortable lounge chairs around the pools. Some of your correspondents said that the mostly Swiss and German staff do not like to speak English. They have probably left as it is totally untrue. My wife is English and we live in the French-speaking part of Switzerland. When they overheard some of our conversation, they immediately switched to either French or English and spoke it very well. A most charming place to which we would love to return. The night butler offers you a choice of ten pillows and a "tisane" for a good night's sleep. Had a "morning sun" room with balcony on the first floor and were undisturbed by any noise.
reviews.title: A jewel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Giardino Ascona is a gem if you want to hide away for a couple of days. The hotel offers everything you could imagine. The garden offers plenty of space to relax or to get involved in some great conversations. The food and drinks you get during the day are fantastic.
reviews.title: Awesome hide away hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel offers a daily program which includes daily wine tastings and different activities. The golf course around the corner looks fantastic. Unfortunately we haven't had the time to play.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel, Setting and Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is fantastic and helps you with everything. The little attentions you get during your whole stay make you feel very special.
reviews.title: Will return!
